ready_to_quit: Are you ready to quit smoking tomorrow?
welcome_quitxt: Welcome to Quitxt from the UT Health Science Center! Congrats on your decision to quit smoking!
message_body: It's quit day! To start on the road to a smoke-free life, get rid of cigarettes, butts, matches, lighters and ashtrays.
benefits: Which of these benefits appeals to you the most?
reason_to_quit: Reason to quit smoking while you're young: Add a decade to your life!
